Class RedirectingServlet

Object
GenericServlet
HttpServlet
RedirectingServlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Servlet, ServletConfig, Serializable
@WebServlet(name="RedirectingServlet", urlPatterns={"/blogs/*","/templates/*","/systemlog/*","/rooms/*","/methods/*","/commands/*","/areas/*","/items/*","/ban/*","/manpages/*","/events/*","/attributes/*","/worldattributes/*","/characters/*","/boards/*","/guilds/*"}) public class RedirectingServlet extends HttpServlet
Takes care to send the index.html file of Angular, so Angular routing can be done with bookmarks.
Author:
maartenl
